tasks.fedify-codegen: cat ../vocab/vocab.ts > /dev/null || (deno run --allow-read --allow-write --check ../codegen/main.ts ../vocab/ ../runtime/ > ../vocab/vocab.ts && deno fmt ../vocab/vocab.ts && deno cache ../vocab/vocab.ts && deno check ../vocab/vocab.ts)
tasks.codegen: deno task fedify-codegen && deno task generate-import-map && deno task sync-version
tasks.run: deno task codegen && deno run --allow-all mod.ts
tasks.publish: deno task codegen && deno task generate-import-map --release && deno publish
